main.name: Ravi Raj
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ravi Raj! . I've been coding for over 1.5 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked as both front-end and back-end developer to help build & scale their companies. I am currently worked with peopleMaticlab as a full stack developer intern.I have a good problem sloving skills and I am good listner so i can grab new skills very easier. I also love to finding pattern in real time data set so  I also passionate to learn data Science skills.

education.description: I am persuing my graduation, i will get First Class Honours.

work.title: Full stack web developer inter
work.description: Front-End and Back-End website development according to client.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
